last_episode_to_air.name: Robert Blake
last_episode_to_air.overview: On May 4, 2001 the new wife of actor Robert Blake, Bonnie Lee Bakley, is shot to death in the couple’s car. Blake claims she was attacked while the actor momentarily returned to a nearby restaurant to retrieve his gun. Almost immediately, rumours begin to circulate about their short lived marriage. It was no secret that although newlyweds, the couple were far from lovers.

name: Rich and Acquitted
overview: Some defendants can afford the best defense attorneys in the country. Evidence is twisted to create gaps of doubt. And in the end the defendants are acquitted even when they may appear guilty. Each hour-long episode of the documentary series Rich and Acquitted tells the story of celebrities who use their money in order to escape tricky legal situations.

episodes.name: Michael Jackson
episodes.overview: He’s undeniably the biggest pop star in the world. Michael Jackson has lived his life in the spotlight and is no stranger to being judged in the court of public opinion. However, in 2005 he stands trial for what will ultimately cost him much of his financial empire and certainly his status as the King of Pop.

episodes.name: OJ Simpson
episodes.overview: Before OJ Simpson was infamous, he was the most famous American Footballer as well as an actor, spokesperson and broadcaster. He was worth nearly ten million dollars, and brought in nearly a million more per year. But on the night of June 12, 1994, OJ Simpson’s life Took a dramatic turn, one that ended up costing him millions of dollars.

episodes.name: Snoop Dog
episodes.overview: In August, 1993 22 year old Calvin Broadus Jr. – then known as Snoop Doggy Dog – was fast becoming one of the biggest names in the world of gangsta rap. But that year, he also faced murder charges in the killing of 20 year old Ethiopian Philip Woldermariam at a Los Angeles park.

episodes.name: Oscar Pistorious
episodes.overview: He shot to fame in 2012 after becoming the first man to compete in both the Paralympic Games and Olympic Games in London. His two J-shaped prosthetics earned him the moniker, “The Blade Runner.” He is dashing, rich and famous; he can seemingly do no wrong. But on the night of February 14, 2013, his gilded life turns dark when he fatally shoots his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.

episodes.name: R. Kelly
episodes.overview: At the turn of the century R&B dominated the music charts. And with mega success come cash, sex and of course, excess! It’s a great time to be a star and R Kelly is at the top of his game. However, not all is, as it seems.

episodes.name: Robert Blake
episodes.overview: On May 4, 2001 the new wife of actor Robert Blake, Bonnie Lee Bakley, is shot to death in the couple’s car. Blake claims she was attacked while the actor momentarily returned to a nearby restaurant to retrieve his gun. Almost immediately, rumours begin to circulate about their short lived marriage. It was no secret that although newlyweds, the couple were far from lovers.
